payload.message:
Track Claude usage using the OpenClaw MANAGED BROWSER.

## Method: Managed Browser (profile="openclaw")

1. Use browser tool with profile="openclaw" to open https://claude.ai/settings/usage
2. Take a snapshot of the page
3. Extract these values:
   - Current session: X% used, resets in Y
   - Weekly All Models: X% used, resets Thu 1:00 PM
   - Sonnet only: X% used, resets Thu 4:00 PM

**IMPORTANT:** Always use profile="openclaw" (NOT profile="chrome"). The managed browser stays logged in permanently.

## Update Data Files

Write to BOTH:
- /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/mission-control/public/data/claude-usage.json
- /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/mission-control/data/claude-usage.json

Format:
{
  "plan": "Max",
  "checks": [
    {
      "timestamp": "<ISO timestamp>",
      "current_session": { "percent_used": <num>, "resets_in": "<time>" },
      "weekly_all_models": { "percent_used": <num>, "resets": "Thu 1:00 PM" },
      "weekly_sonnet": { "percent_used": <num>, "resets": "Thu 4:00 PM" }
    }
  ],
  "notes": "Auto-monitored via managed browser (profile=openclaw)"
}

Keep last 10 checks in the array (prepend new, trim old).

After updating, cd /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/mission-control && git add -A && git commit -m "Update usage data" && git push

## Alert Rules

Only message Jean on Discord channel:1474109579762602077 if:
- Weekly All Models > 60%
- Sonnet only > 70%  
- Session > 80%

Otherwise stay silent.

DASHBOARD SYNC TASK

Update Mission Control dashboard with current status:

1. Read workspace/mission-control/data/board.json
2. Check cron jobs for any failures
3. Check agent status (sessions_list)
4. Update board.json with:
   - New tasks discovered
   - Status changes
   - Completed items
5. Git commit and push if changes made

Keep it accurate. Only update if there's real changes.

FITNESS AGENT TASK: Health check. Ping https://fitness-dashboard-vite.onrender.com/api/dashboard - verify it returns valid JSON with meals, bodyComp, training arrays. If healthy, update agents/fitness/state.json with timestamp and status 'healthy'. Only alert Discord if something is WRONG. Silent success.

Run the Withings sync for the fitness dashboard project as an evening backup.

Steps:
1) cd /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/fitness-dashboard-vite
2) Run: npm run withings:sync
3) Return a short status summary including mapped readings and whether Notion was updated or created.

If it fails, include exact error and likely fix.

FITNESS AGENT TASK: Evening macro check for jaysm. Read agents/fitness/AGENT.md and config.json. Fetch today's data from dashboard API (https://fitness-dashboard-vite.onrender.com/api/dashboard). Calculate if user hit calorie (2700-2800) and protein (160-170g) targets. Send a brief evening update to Discord with status: on track, under, or over. Be direct, not preachy.

USAGE TRACKING: Daily summary.

Check today's activity:
1. Read memory/2026-02-*.md files for session activity
2. Count cron job runs from cron list
3. Update workspace/mission-control/data/usage.json with today's stats

DO NOT message Jean unless there's something unusual (like hitting rate limits or errors). This is background bookkeeping.

Review workspace documentation files for quality and consistency:

Read these files: AGENTS.md, MEMORY.md, SOUL.md, IDENTITY.md, USER.md, TOOLS.md, HEARTBEAT.md

Look for:
- Outdated information or stale entries
- Conflicting rules or contradictions
- Undocumented workflows or missing context
- Lessons from recent failures that should be captured
- Memory entries that need updating

**Important:** DO NOT make any changes. Only propose recommendations.

Format your response as:
- Start with 'AUDIT_CLEAR' if no changes needed
- Otherwise, list specific proposed changes with file name and brief reason
- Keep it concise - only suggest changes that genuinely improve the docs

This is a review, not an edit session.

NIGHTLY AUTONOMOUS WORK - Dashboard Maintenance

PRIORITY: Keep Mission Control dashboard fresh and accurate.

1. **Export cron job data:**
   - Run: openclaw cron list --json
   - Write the output to mission-control/data/cron-jobs.json and mission-control/public/data/cron-jobs.json
   - Format: { "jobs": [...], "lastUpdated": "ISO timestamp" }

2. **Sync board.json with reality:**
   - Read cron job list (cron list)
   - Check agent status (sessions_list)
   - Update task statuses based on actual state
   - Add new tasks discovered from logs/activity
   - Mark completed items as done

3. **Update metrics:**
   - Read data/claude-usage.json for latest usage
   - Update data/usage.json with today stats
   - Calculate weekly progress

4. **Small improvements:**
   - Fix any UI bugs noticed
   - Improve data display
   - Polish aesthetics

5. **Git commit & push:**
   - Commit changes with descriptive message
   - Push to GitHub

Work in /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/mission-control

Deliver brief summary to Discord channel:1474109579762602077 ONLY if you made meaningful changes.

GITHUB BACKUP: Auto-commit and push workspace changes.

1. cd /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace
2. Run: git add -A
3. Run: git status to see what changed
4. If there are changes, commit with message: "Auto-backup: [date] - [brief summary of changes]"
5. Run: git push origin master
6. If nothing changed, do nothing

This is a silent background task. Only alert Discord channel:1474109579762602077 if the push FAILS. Otherwise return HEARTBEAT_OK.

state.lastError: Error: cron: job execution timed out

payload.message:
AUTONOMOUS WORK SESSION (2 AM)

Read USER.md for mission context. Pick ONE high-impact task:

1. Dashboard improvements - Mission Control polish
2. Agent optimization - better prompts, smarter logic
3. Documentation - keep configs and memory current
4. Code cleanup - refactor, fix bugs, improve quality

Complete it. Log to memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md. Brief summary to Discord channel:1474109579762602077 only if you accomplished something meaningful.

AUTONOMOUS WORK SESSION (5 AM)

Read USER.md for mission context. Pick ONE high-impact task:

1. Dashboard improvements - Mission Control polish
2. Agent optimization - better prompts, smarter logic  
3. Documentation - keep configs and memory current
4. Research - find AI business opportunities, trends

Complete it. Log to memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md. Brief summary to Discord channel:1474109579762602077 only if you accomplished something meaningful.

Daily Price Report - ACTIVE MODE

You are Max, the business assistant for Maldo Distributors. It's 7:00 AM Puerto Rico time.

Your task:
1. Read /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/agents/maldo/data/products.json and /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/agents/maldo/data/watchlist.json to see what products are being tracked
2. Read /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/agents/maldo/data/maldo-top-products.json for the current product list
3. Search for current prices of the top 5 priority products (Monster Energy, Red Bull, Coca-Cola, Doritos, etc.)
4. Compare with last known prices in watchlist.json
5. If there are price changes or notable deals:
   - Format a WhatsApp-friendly daily digest (bullets, NOT tables)
   - Send to Jorge at +17877105233 via WhatsApp
   - Update watchlist.json with new prices and timestamp
6. If nothing changed significantly (no price changes >), stay silent - don't spam
7. Log the report summary to /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/agents/maldo/memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md

Message format when sending:
üìä *Reporte de Precios - [date]*

üîΩ Baj√≥ de precio:
‚Ä¢ [Product]: .XX ‚Üí .YY en [Store] (-.ZZ)

üîº Subi√≥:
‚Ä¢ [Product]: .XX ‚Üí .YY en [Store] (+.ZZ)

‚úÖ Sin cambios: [count] productos estables

üí° Deal del d√≠a: [best deal found]

Remember: You send the WhatsApp message directly. This job has delivery mode 'none' - you handle the messaging.

FITNESS AGENT TASK: Morning brief for jaysm. Read agents/fitness/AGENT.md and config.json. Fetch data from the dashboard API (https://fitness-dashboard-vite.onrender.com/api/dashboard). Send a morning brief to Discord with today's targets, current phase info, and any relevant alerts. Keep it concise and motivating.

You are the Daily Intelligence Cron Agent. Execute the daily intelligence protocol exactly and produce all required artifacts.

Context:
- Workspace root: /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace
- Protocol file: /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/scripts/daily-intel.md
- Output directory: /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/memory
- Date/timezone: America/New_York

Your mission each run:
1) Run TikTok trends skill
   - cd /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/skills/tiktok-trends
   - bash scripts/run_trends.sh
   - Save output to /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/memory/trends-YYYY-MM-DD.json

2) Run GEO market scan
   - Use Brave search for: GEO optimization, AI visibility audit, generative engine optimization
   - Identify new competitors, pricing changes, and market moves
   - Save to /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/memory/geo-market-YYYY-MM-DD.md

3) Check AI news
   - Find top 3 AI stories of the day
   - Filter for relevance to Jean's mission (agents, automation, monetization, visibility/GEO)

4) Compile final brief
   - Write /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/memory/daily-intel-YYYY-MM-DD.md

5) Post highlights to Discord:
   - Top merch opportunity -> channel:1474911498307502322
   - GEO market update -> channel:1474109579762602077
   - AI news -> channel:1474911498307502322

Keep outputs concise, actionable, decision-focused. If a source fails, continue and note the gap.

VIC MISSIONS: Generate weekly mission for Vic.

1. Read agents/vic-missions/SOUL.md for personality
2. Read agents/vic-missions/AGENT.md for instructions
3. Read agents/vic-missions/onboarding.json - check onboarding phase
4. Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json

IF IN ONBOARDING: Generate mission for next module.
IF ONBOARDING COMPLETE: Generate research/work mission from projects.json.

Update active-mission.json.
Be an enthusiastic mentor. Spanish only.

MORNING BRIEF for Jean.

Read HEARTBEAT.md for format guidelines.
Read USER.md for context on what matters.

Deliver a morning brief to Discord channel:1474109579762602077 (#max) with:
1. üóìÔ∏è Today's schedule (check calendar if available, otherwise skip)
2. üí™ Fitness targets reminder (calories: 2700-2900, protein: 160-180g)
3. üöÄ One actionable thing to advance the AI business mission today
4. ‚òÄÔ∏è Weather in Jean's timezone if relevant

Keep it to 4-5 bullets. Tight, actionable, motivating. Start with 'Buenos d√≠as' or 'Good morning'.

DAILY AI DISCOVERY: Post one interesting AI news, tool, or concept to Discord.

1. Search the web for today's most interesting AI news, new tools, or breakthroughs
2. Pick ONE thing that would be exciting and accessible to a beginner learning about AI
3. Write a short, engaging post in Spanish (3-4 paragraphs max)
4. Include: what it is, why it matters, and how someone could use it
5. Add relevant emojis and make it feel exciting, not academic
6. Post to Discord channel where daily-discovery is (check channel list for the guild 1083574882006212649, find the daily-discovery channel)

Style: Think of it like sharing a cool find with a friend who's just getting into AI. Casual, enthusiastic, informative.

End with a question to encourage engagement, like '¬øQu√© opinan?' or '¬øLes gustar√≠a saber m√°s sobre esto?'

Run the Withings sync for the fitness dashboard project.

Steps:
1) cd /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/fitness-dashboard-vite
2) Run: npm run withings:sync
3) Return a short status summary including the mapped readings (weight, body fat, muscle mass, lean mass, bmr) and whether Notion was updated or created.

If it fails, include the exact error and likely fix.

MALDO LAUNCH - Monday Feb 24, 9 AM

‚ö†Ô∏è DO NOT cold-message anyone via WhatsApp API. That gets accounts restricted.

Instead, send Jean a reminder on Discord channel:1474109579762602077:

"üöÄ Maldo launch time! Reminder: text Jorge (+17877105233) and Karla (+17872353649) from your personal WhatsApp and ask them to message the business number +18634205195. Once they message, I'll send the welcome messages automatically."

Also read /Users/jeanseda/.openclaw/workspace/agents/maldo/welcome.md and have the welcome messages ready to send as soon as Jorge and Karla initiate contact.

This job does NOT auto-delete anymore since it's just a reminder.

VIC ACCOUNTABILITY: Tuesday kickstart.

Read agents/vic-missions/SOUL.md for personality.
Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json for current mission.

Send a SHORT friendly message:
- ¬øYa empezaste con la misi√≥n?
- ¬øTienes alguna pregunta?
- Ofrece ayuda si est√° atorado

Keep it brief and encouraging. Spanish only.

VIC MISSIONS: Mid-week check-in.

Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json.

If active mission and no recent completion, send a friendly check-in.
Keep it short and encouraging, not nagging.
Spanish only.

If mission is complete, send congratulations.

PRE-RESET WORK SESSION ‚Äî Use up remaining capacity!

Jean's Claude Max resets Thursday 1 PM. This is the final push to maximize value.

Do 2-3 substantial tasks:
1. Major dashboard improvement or new feature
2. Research: Find 3 AI business opportunities and summarize them
3. Agent optimization or new automation

Go big. Log everything to memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md. Report to Discord channel:1474109579762602077 with what you accomplished.

FINAL PUSH before reset at 1 PM!

Last chance to use this billing cycle. Do something substantial:
1. Build a new feature or tool
2. Deep research on a business opportunity
3. Major documentation or system improvement

Maximize the value. Report to Discord channel:1474109579762602077.

VIC ACCOUNTABILITY: Friday deadline reminder.

Read agents/vic-missions/SOUL.md for personality.
Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json for current mission.

Remind Vic:
- Today is the deadline
- Ask for his progress/deliverable
- Be encouraging but clear

Spanish only.

payload.message:
VIC ACCOUNTABILITY: Friday evening final push.

Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json - check if mission was completed.

If NOT completed:
- Send final reminder: '√öltima llamada para la misi√≥n de esta semana'
- Offer to help finish it together

If completed: Send congratulations instead.

Spanish only.

VIC ACCOUNTABILITY: Saturday escalation check.

Read agents/vic-missions/active-mission.json - check completion status.

If mission NOT completed this week:
- Report: 'Update de Vic: La misi√≥n de esta semana no se complet√≥'
- What the mission was
- Suggest next steps

If completed: Send positive report instead.

This goes to Jean's private channel, not Vic's.

FITNESS AGENT TASK: Weekly progress report for jaysm. Read agents/fitness/AGENT.md. Fetch full week's data from dashboard API. Calculate: avg daily calories, avg protein, weight trend, days on target, compliance %. Compare to previous week if data available. Send comprehensive but readable report to Discord with trends and one actionable recommendation.
